itunes:title: Episode 600 - Special Guest Kevin Sorbo
title: Episode 600 - Special Guest Kevin Sorbo
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest “Hercules” actor Kevin Sorbo to discuss the overreaction that is the quarantine and the detrimental effect it has had on the economy, discuss the experience of a Minnesota Vikings game at the U.S. Ban...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest “Hercules” actor Kevin Sorbo to discuss the overreaction that is the quarantine and the detrimental effect it has had on the economy, discuss the experience of a Minnesota Vikings game at the U.S. Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, Kevin tells funny stories of US presidents he has met while filming, and entertains the idea of a possible “Hercules” reboot.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest “Hercules” actor Kevin Sorbo to discuss the overreaction that is the quarantine and the detrimental effect it has had on the economy, discuss the experience of a Minnesota Vikings game at the U.S. Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, Kevin tells funny stories of US presidents he has met while filming, and entertains the idea of a possible “Hercules” reboot.
